Definitely! Here are some tips for staying consistent with meditation:

1. Set a regular time and place: Try to meditate at the same time and in the same location every day to make it a more consistent habit. 2. Start small: Begin with just a few minutes of meditation at a time and gradually work up to longer sessions as you become more comfortable and practiced. 3. Use guided meditations: There are many apps, websites, and videos that offer guided meditations, which can help you stay focused and motivated. 4. Incorporate meditation into your daily routine: Pair your meditation practice with an existing habit, such as after waking up or before bedtime. 5. Remind yourself of the benefits: Remember the reasons why you started meditating in the first place and the positive impact it has on your mental and physical health. 6. Don't be too hard on yourself: If you miss a day or don't feel like meditating, don't beat yourself up. Just try to start again the next day. Remember that establishing a new habit takes time and patience, so be kind to yourself and celebrate your progress along the way!
